tasks.task: Setting up cleaning supplies and work area for sanitation operations.
subtasks: Displaying sorted items in designated buckets by color.
Sorting dirty cloths and placing them into appropriate color-coded buckets.
Adding cleaning solution to buckets at the end of the week for soaking.
Washing and running individual loads for each color of cloths.
Storing OxiClean solution for soaking aprons and uniforms.
Organizing and distributing personal protective equipment such as shoe covers and garbage bags.
Preparing empty bottles for restocking supplies.
Ensuring the work area organized and efficient for one to four operators.
Setting up work area in the garden for operations.
Decorating or maintaining the garden area.

tasks.task: Set up and organize a cleaning station.
subtasks: Sort and process colored cloths.
Prepare cleaning solutions.
Store personal protective equipment.
Organize supplies for multiple operators.

tasks.task: Organize operational setup for user operations.

subtasks: Sort and store sorted items in color-coded buckets.
Soak colored cloths using cleaning solution.
Manage OxiClean solution for cleaning workwear.
Organize and distribute personal protective equipment.
Restock empty bottles for supply management.
Arrange work area for one to four people.

tasks.task: Set up and organize cleaning area.
Setup and organization of cleaning depot.

subtasks: - **Wipe down and arrange color-coded buckets** for sorted materials (SUBTASK)
- **Prepare cleaning solutions** (e.g., OxiClean) and place them in accessible locations (SUBTASK)
- **Organize personal protective equipment** for easy access (SUBTASK)
- **Restock empty bottles** for supply management (SUBTASK)
- **Arrange the workspace** to accommodate one to four operators efficiently (SUBTASK)
Sort and store sorted items in color-coded buckets.
Prepare cleaning solutions and place in designated containers.
Organize personal protective equipment for easy access.
Restock empty bottles for supply management.
Arrange the workspace to accommodate one to four operators.
